keyword: how many calories in a reeses cup
title: How Many Calories in a Reese's Cup?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a Reese's cup, including full nutrition breakdown like fat, carbs, protein, and quick tweaks for variations.
h1: How Many Calories in a Reese's Cup?
assumptions: Standard single Reese's Peanut Butter Cup (21g), milk chocolate with creamy peanut butter filling; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, batch, and manufacturer; values based on average USDA/Hershey's data. Check packaging for exact info.

quick_answer.text: A standard Reese's Peanut Butter Cup contains about 110 calories and 2g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison with packaging.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Reese's cup?
faqs.a: Approximately 110 calories for a standard single cup.

faqs.q: What are the macros in a Reese's cup?
faqs.a: About 8g fat, 11g carbs (9g sugars), 2g protein, and 0.5g fiber.

faqs.q: Does a Reese's cup have trans fat?
How much sugar is in a Reese's Peanut Butter Cup?
faqs.a: Around 9g of sugars per standard cup.

faqs.q: Are Reese's cups high in sodium?
faqs.a: One cup has about 85mg sodium, which is moderate.
